title: Wales given injury boost as Adam Beard returns to full training following appendix surgery last month
text:
Wales lock Adam Beard is back in full training ahead of the team's final two pool matches against Fiji and Uruguay, following his appendix surgery last month.

Beard stayed behind for his operation while the rest of the squad flew out to Japan, before linking up with the team in Toyota ahead of their opening match against Georgia.

The 6ft 8in second-row has since been working hard to regain the weight he lost following surgery, admitting last week that he was lucky to have not boarded the flight to Japan given the serious risk to his health.
